name: GXO Logistics, Inc.
description: GXO Logistics, Inc. is a leading global logistics provider specializing in contract logistics and supply chain solutions. Founded in 2021 as a spin-off from XPO Logistics, GXO is dedicated to revolutionizing the logistics industry through innovative technology and advanced service capabilities. The company operates in over 1,000 locations across more than 25 countries, offering a comprehensive range of services that include warehousing, transportation, and integrated supply chain solutions. GXO is known for its commitment to leveraging automation and data analytics to enhance operational efficiency and improve customer experiences. With a focus on sustainability, the company actively implements eco-friendly practices throughout its operations, aiming to reduce carbon emissions and promote responsible resource use. GXO's mission is to empower its clients by providing tailored logistics solutions that drive growth, enhance flexibility, and optimize supply chains in an increasingly complex global market.
